body:
Comment 2 by **hwang.dev**: 
After changing "for" to "select", the stack trace can be printed and the program
terminates correctly.

Is there any way to prevent the hanging of runtime.Stack even when for loop hangs?
Because I am trying to set a timeout for an operation and print the call stacks of all
goroutines, there is no way to limit what causes the timeout. (for loop is still a
possible situation).
